definition: a device for creating a current of air by movement of a surface or surfaces, make (an emotion) fiercer
details:
noun
- a device for creating a current of air by movement of a surface or surfaces
- an ardent follower and admirer
= synonyms: buff
- an enthusiastic devotee of sports
= synonyms: sports fan, rooter
verb
- make (an emotion) fiercer
= example: make (an emotion) fiercer
- strike out (a batter), (of a pitcher)
- separate the chaff from by using air currents
= synonyms: winnow
- agitate the air
